title: Checkpoint Quantum Firewall - Application Control
description: - This dashboard gives insights about application control related logs.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights about application control related logs.

## Widgets
1. Total Events
2. Total Traffic
3. Events Over Time
4. Events by Severity
5. Events by Action
6. Top Allowed Sources
7. Top Blocked Sources
8. Top Allowed Destinations
9. Top Blocked Destinations
10. Top Allowed Categories
11. Top Blocked Categories
12. Top Allowed Services
13. Top Blocked Services
14. Allowed Applications
15. Blocked Applications
16. Categories by Traffic
17. Applications/Sites by Traffic
18. High Risk Allowed Applications
19. Log Details

search.query: source:checkpoint-quantum-firewall @product:"Application Control" @action:(Drop OR Reject OR Block) $Checkpoint_Server $Action $Application_Category $Application_Name
